summary: [b][color=red]If you see any graphical glitches or problems, please inform me![/color][/b]
descriptionHtml:
[i][heading][b][color=red]BlackDeath Dungeon[/color][/b][/heading][/i]
If you see any graphical glitches or problems, please inform me!
[i][b][color=red]Note that this process is going to be slower seeing as school has started up again and I have been assigned as an Element leader in my ROTC flight, which means responsibilities and all that good shit. If I could please ask all of you to be patient it would be much appreciated.[/color][/b][/i]
_____________________________________________________________________________
Video(s):
(I will be uploading one shortly. Or, If you upload one please inform me.)

_____________________________________________________________________________
Location:
-- I\'ll upload this later, I forgot to make a not on where exactly it was. It is outside 
of Riverword Somewhere to the west, Or just go into the console commands
and type \"coc BlackDeathDungeonExterior\", and it should be around there. 
_____________________________________________________________________________
Versions:

Beta Testing V.1

Beta Testing V.2

Beta Testing V.3

Beta Testing V.4
_____________________________________________________________________________
Installation(manual):
1) Extract the folder to your desktop or someplace easily accessable
2) Go to your skyrim Data folder (\"C:\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\")
3) Open up the \"BlackDeath Dungeon Folder\"
4) Drag and drop the  .esp into the data folder
5) After that the installation is done and you\'re ready to go
______________________________________________________________________________
To-Do-List:
1) Add NavMeshing (Done)
2) Fix Graphical Glitches (Done)
3) Expand Dungeon (Partiall done/Half-way Done)
4) Add Bosses/Monsters
5) Release Final Version
6) Continue on updating and adding more until I feel I am 110% please
______________________________________________________________________________
Updates:

Update - Beta V.2: Added Navmeshing allowing your Followers to join you in the dungeon (8/1/2013)
Update -  Beta V.3: Fixed any and all graphic glitches, as well a block of the cave to 
later/necessary use. (8/1/2013)
Update - Beta V.4: Added 2 more rooms, and partially extended the dungeon. as well as fix the door. (8/1/2013)
_____________________________________________________________________________
Other mods:
COMING SOON!
